1. Artificial Intelligence Gives Weather Forecasters a New Edge  The New York Times
  2. AI-powered weather and climate models are set to change the future of forecasting, researchers say  Phys.org
  3. The secret to better weather forecasts may be a dash of AI  The Register
  4. Quiet AI revolution taking weather forecasting by storm  The Naked Scientists
  5. A machine learning model that outperforms conventional global subseasonal forecast models  Nature.com

item.title: Apple says its AI models were trained on Google’s custom chips - CNBC
item.description:
1. Apple says its AI models were trained on Google’s custom chips  CNBC
  2. The iPhone is about to get smarter, in part thanks to Google chips  9to5Mac
  3. Apple says it took a ‘responsible’ approach to training its Apple Intelligence models  TechCrunch
  4. Apple opts for Google chips in AI infrastructure, sidestepping Nvidia  AI News
  5. No love lost between Apple and Nvidia as iGiant chooses Google chips for AI training  The Register

item.title: Could you be an Olympic gymnast? This AI judge can tell you - CNN
item.description:
1. Could you be an Olympic gymnast? This AI judge can tell you  CNN
  2. In gymnastics, cameras are used to automatically judge moves using posture recognition, ensuring fairness in the judging process.  GIGAZINE（ギガジン）
  3. European Gymnastics Launches AI-Powered Digital Assistant to Promote Sport and Community  Vancity Buzz
  4. Championing European Gymnastics with Borderless Knowledge enabled by Artificial Intelligence and OriginTrail  GlobeNewswire
